Name: Chocolate Mint Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
RIM GLASS with chocolate powder (moisten outside rim with orange juice and dip into chocolate powder).
Nutrition: One serving of Chocolate Mint Martini contains 232 calories
